item.description:
Start Date: Apr 17, 2013
End Date: Apr 21, 2013

Weekday Timings: 6:30 PM - 10:00 PM
Weekend Timings: 10:00 AM - 5:00 PM

 

Yesplus: Your Enlightened Side

An internationally acclaimed leadership and well-being program that provides practical tools for success in our busy lives. Success at work, in school, in relationships and in service depends on our level of energy and our state of mind. Through breathing techniques, yoga and meditation, yesplus teaches us how to:
- feel more present and happy 
- manage stress and emotions like anger, fear, guilt, regret, and anxiety
- increase our energy level
- sleep better
- gain mental focus
- enhance leadership and communication skills 

With yesplus we can be the change we want to see in our communities. The workshop will be taught April 17 - 21 and is open to adults of all ages (18 and older).

Learn about the cornerstone technique of the course here: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=F4S_4jX0ERA

Contact us:
info@bostonmeditates.org (857)600-0602
item.how_to_find_us: 10 minutes walk from South Station on Summer St
item.name: The yesplus workshop
